DOC.brief_title: Unexpected Pharmacokinetics Vancomycin Patients With Severe Acute Pancreatitis Compared With Pneumonia
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate influence severe acute pancreatitis serum level vancomycin , glycopeptide antibacterial agent . After review 6000 clinical chart patient receive vancomycin therapy whose serum vancomycin level monitor January 2010 December 2013 , identify 212 patient also diagnose severe acute pancreatitis ( SAP group ) , 98 patient also diagnose pneumonia ( pneumonia group ) time . The fluorescence polarization immunoassay method use measure vancomycin serum trough concentration patient 30 min next administration . Using measurement , calculate pharmacokinetic parameter use Bayesian estimator .
